refnamediv.refpurpose: Deletes the specified list of objects from the mged display. This is a synonym for the erase_allcommand.

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: Deletes the specified list of objects from the mged display. This is a synonym for the erase_all command. This command will allow the user to delete objects that have not been explicitly displayed (unlike the d command). Note that this has no effect on the BRL-CAD database itself. To actually remove objects from the database, use the killcommand.

refsection.title: EXAMPLES
refsection.para: The example shows the use of the dall command to delete a region and a shape from the mged display, even if they have not been explicitly displayed.

example.title: Delete a region and a shape from the mged display, even if they have not been explicitly displayed.
example.para: Deletes region1 and shapea from the mged display.

refsection.title: BUG REPORTS
refsection.para: Reports of bugs or problems should be submitted via electronic mail to <devs@brlcad.org>, or via the "cadbug.sh" script.
